channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Melania Ab

item.title: Project D: From an ML model to a Prediction App
item.description: General information: Creating the app for an ML model. image:PluralSight Heroku API: The journey of a model: an ML Model becomes available as an app in Heroku through Flask. Approach: Data cleaning/wrangling, processing application of a WSGI web application framework (Flask) creating app in platform API (Heroku) Ref. Flask and Heroku Predict monthly rates for a grant writer with coding/programming skills Let’s start with Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and ML.

item.title: Project C: Drug-like Targets for Coronavirus
item.description: General information: Can we find potent bioactive molecules with drug-like properties against COVID19? Coronavirus: Coronavirus family is a large family of coronaviruses including the cause of COVID-19 pandemic, SARS-CoV-2. Coronaviruses usually cause mild to moderate upper-respiratory tract illnesses, like the common cold. However, SARS-CoV-2 can cause serious illness and even death. Why people’s COVID-19 symptoms vary so greatly isn’t fully understood. Approach: Data cleaning/wrangling, processing and visualization: Ref. documents in Coronavirus_part1/2/3_Bioactivity_Data_Concised_Acetylcholinesterase.

item.title: Project B: RNA Binding Proteins
item.description: General information: The characterized novel mtRNA transport pathway can be used for the introduction of corrective RNAs in to mitochondria (potential: cure or ameliorate mitochondrial diseases). Mitochondrial Disorders: Defects in mtDNA (e.g., mutation, deletions) can caue several disorders such as neurodegenerative diseases. Approach: Characterization of the mtRNA transport pathway (IP-MS) Data cleaning: the identified MS peptides with FDR < 0.05 were selected for further analyses. Putative components of the mtRNA transport pathway have been identified by PNPase-Antibody IP technique using Hela cells (SAINTexpress, STRINGdb)

item.title: Project A: Nutrient Transporters
item.description: General information: The identified novel pathogenic nutrient transporters have the potential to be used as tools for the design of disease control strategies for this historic plant pathogen. Irish Famine: Famine resulted in death of about 1 million Irish people, and migration of another 1 million from the island to North America and Great Britain. Approach: Identification of nutrient transporters in pathogen using RNA-seq data collected from pathogen - (systemPipeR - edgeR) Data cleaning: The genes with expression of >2 fold and FDR <0.

item.title: Project E: US Bank Stocks
item.description: General information: Analyses on the US bank stocks from 2006 - 2020. Approach: Data acquisition, cleaning/wrangling, processing and visualization: Ref. Data from Yahoo Finance Application of different data visualization steps Let’s start with data acquisition from Yahoo Fiance! ## examples from pandas_datareader import data, wb import pandas as pd #call for dates start = datetime.datetime(2006, 1, 1) end = datetime.datetime(2020, 12, 1) #Bank of America BAC = data.
